2025 - Summer

S25 Software Engineering Internship 168487B

Co-op Position

Kitchener, ON

Canada

4 months

To be confirmed

Salary Currency

CAD

Salary

Job Description

Salary Not Available, 0 Major List

ApplyBoard simplifies the study abroad search, application, and acceptance process by connecting international students,

recruitment partners, and educational institutions on one intuitive and personalized platform.

ApplyBoard is a mission-driven, hyper-growth organization. It has been attracting dedicated individuals for more than eight years

who are inspired every day to break down barriers to international education and take their careers to new heights at a company

that will invest in their career growth

Our six core values are our compass in our mission to Educate the World and the foundation of our unique company culture. As an

organization built on a foundation of diversity, it's important that our team members are representative of the students from more

than 150 countries that we support.

Key Responsibilities:

•

As a Software Developer at ApplyBoard what you do will impact the lives of many students

•

You will be developing services used by students all around the world

•

You will be tasked with delivering well-tested, clean code while working both independently and with a team

•

You will be involved in creating everything from machine learning models to backend systems that are used by thousands of

people each day

Job Requirements

Preferred Qualifications:

•

Experience with Data Structures, Algorithms and Object-Oriented Programming, Git

•

Web development experience in any of the following: Python, Ruby, Javascript

•

Using and/or creating RESTful APIs

•

Interest and ability to learn other tools and technologies as needed

Bonus points for:

Evidence of a project that you have worked on that can showcase your skillset
•
Citizenship Requirement

N/A

APPLICATION INFORMATION

Application Procedure

Through Employer Website

Special Application Instructions

Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's

website.

Application Link:

https://applyboard.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/ApplyBoardNH/job/Kitchener/Software-Engineering-Internship_JR102760

Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions

are received.

Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
